JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Inhouse Merchandiser for New Yorker, Copenhagen. Top store in the Nordics!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Inhouse Merchandiser for New Yorker, Copenhagen. Top store in the Nordics!

Are you motivated by developing your own work and getting new challenges? Then you fit in our team. TODAY, NEW YORKER has more than 16 000 co-workers - do you want to be our new colleague? We create success stories together by taking new paths, working for a good collaboration, using a flat organizational structure and having open communication This is the key to NEW YORKER's success in the fashion world for over 40 years. Our first store was started in Germany, and today we have over 1,000 stores in 40 countries.

To strengthen our team in Copenhagen, we are now looking for an Inhouse Merchandiser.

Main areas of work

  • Realize New Yorkers concept through product presentation and exposure
  • Plan, implement and follow up campaign and activity exposures
  • Organize and conduct training for colleagues in merchandising
  • Shop work and sales where you, through your knowledge of products, materials, fashion and trends, advise the customer
  • Travel activity to all departments in Norway can occur when needed

Your profile

  • Completed upper secondary school, preferably specialization in trade and fashion or merchandising
  • At least 1 year of work in retail and talent for merchandising and sales
  • High fashion awareness and preferably experience from the fashion industry
  • Team-oriented and communicative
  • Flexible, copes with stress and likes to work at a high pace
  • Self-driven and takes his own initiative
  • Good knowledge of Norwegian and English, knowledge of German is an advantage
  • Good knowledge of the Office suite
  • Class B driving license is an advantage

We offer

For us, the most important thing is that we have a good international team, for without it even the best plan does not work. With us, you can expect a clear and communicative environment who daily live up to the idea base that the New Yorker stands for: With commitment and courage, we realize ideas that later become fashion trends. More information and vacancies can be found at www.newyorker.eu.

Job type/working hours: Full-time, start-up by agreement.
Further information is available from: Regional manager Carmen Otero Flores  e-mail: COtero@newyorker.de


 

Application: We do not accept applications by mail or e-mail - only via our website https://jobs.newyorker.de Applications by mail, e-mail or delivered to the store will not be processed. Since the selection takes place continuously, we would like you to submit your application as soon as possible and no later than 15.05.2022

 

You will find more information about our vacant position by following the link: http://www.newyorker.eu

Vi kunne godt tænke os, at du blev en del af vores team - så sørg for, at din ansøgning og dit CV kommer os i hænde!
